attributes.action: A knighthood for Chris Packham for services to nature and the environment
attributes.additional_details: By awarding Chris Packham a knighthood, he will be recognised for his lifelong work in nature, the environment, broadcasting and writing. He should also be recognised for his efforts during the Covid pandemic when he set up the self isolating bird club. Many people see Chris as a figurehead for nature and a knighthood would cement this reputation
attributes.background: Chris Packham is a role model and environment champion for nature and the natural world. He is a broadcaster, writer and lobbyist. He also raises awareness of neuro diversity, having autism himself. Chris should be officially recognised for his life long dedication to nature and the environment

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
